meaningMnemonic: When <radical>small</radical> <radical>drop</radical>s of water work <radical>together</radical> they gain <kanji>respect</kanji> for one another. If you end up working with someone long enough, and they end up being really great, you'll respect them too!
readingMnemonic: If you <kanji>respect</kanji> someone enough you'll even take up their hobbies. The person you respect most loves the Yankees. You don't really feel the same, but you respect that about them so you chant, "<reading>Ooh Ya</reading>nkees, <reading>Ooh Ya</reading>nkees!" (うやうや) with them during each game.
